on reading compounds: 理【リ】reason, principle, logic, general principle (as opposed to individual concrete phenomenon), (in neo-Confucianism) the underlying principles of the cosmos
理科【リカ】science (inc. mathematics, medicine, etc.), natural science, science department (university), science course, science (as a school subject)
kun reading compounds: 理【ことわり】reason, logic, sense, natural way of things
